name: HackathonManager
description: All-in-one platform for managing hackathon registration & logistics

DEVISE_SECRET_KEY.description: A randomly-generated secret key for devise authentication.

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A randomly-generated secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

AWS_BUCKET.description: S3 bucket to store resumes in

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS Access Key ID to store resumes via S3

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS Secret Access Key to store resumes via S3

AWS_REGION.description: AWS Secret Access Key to store resumes via S3

ROLLBAR_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Rollbar access token for code exception reporting

SPARKPOST_API_KEY.description: Sparkpost API key for sending email

SPARKPOST_CAMPAIGN_ID.description: Sparkpost campaign ID for sending email (e.g. the name of your hackathon)

HM_DOMAIN_NAME.description: Domain name hosting the website (e.g. apply.example.com)
